\SetAPI{J}
\section{audit.service.defaultmode.active}
\label{configuration:AuditServiceDefaultmodeActive}
\ClearAPI
Defines the default behavior for auditing service calls if the service is not annotated with {@link AuditInfo}. If set to "true" for all service invocations audit entries are generated. Valid values are "true" and "false", default value is "true".
